relation: [2.1] Add hydrator wildcard and new hydrator strategy
[2.1] [WIP] Zend\I18n\Filter\SlugUrl - Made a filter to convert text to slugs
[2.1] Load Messages from other than file
[2.1] Ported FingersCrossed handler from monolog to ZF2
Allow to create empty option in Select
Add support for prev and next link relationships
Add MVC service factories for Filters and Validators
Add paginator factory & adapter plugin manager
Convert abstract classes that are only offering static methods
Method Select::from can accept instance of Select as subselect
Allow to specify custom pattern for date
Added a new validator to check if input is instance of certain class
Add view helper and controller plugin to pull the current identity from ...
Added methods to allow access to the routes of the SimpleRouteStack.
Allow Zend\Db\Sql\TableIdentifier in Zend\Db\Sql\Insert, Update & Delete
Added the ability for FirePhp to understand 'extras' passed to \Zend\Log
Allow to remove attribute in form element
fixing extract behavior of Zend\Form\Element\Collection and added ability to use own fieldset helper within FormCollection-helper
[WIP][Server] Rewrite Reflection API to reuse code from Zend\Code\Reflection API
[Code] Add support for @throws, multiple types and typed arrays
[InputFilter] Adding hasUnknown and getUnknown methods to detect and get unknown inputs
Add a bunch of traits to ZF2
Cache: Now an empty namespace means disabling namespace support
Decouple Zend\Db\Sql from concrete Zend\Db\Adapter implementations
Fixing the problem with order and \Zend\Db\Sql\Expression
Added Json support for POST and PUT operations in restful controller.
Allow NodeList to be accessed via array like syntax.
Fix for Collection extract method updates targetElement object
Added ValidatorChain::attach() and ValidatorChain::attachByName() to keep consistent with FilterChain
Added NTLM authentication support to Zend\Soap\Client\DotNet.
Zend-Form: Allow Input Filter Preference Over Element Defaults
Zend/Di, retriving same shared instance for different extra parameters
Allows several translation files for same domain / locale
A fix for issue #3195. Date formats are now used during validation.
Fixed wrong return usage and added @throws docblock
remove else in already return early
Added Zend Monitor custom event support
Proposing removal of subscription record upon unsubscribe
Hotfix #3046 - set /dev/urandom as entropy file for Session
Fix indentation, add trailing ',' to last element in array
Missed the Zend\Text dependency for Zend\Mvc in composer.json
Fix an issue with inheritance of placeholder registry
Fixed FileGenerator::setUse() to ignore already added uses.
Fixed FileGenerator::setUses() to allow passing in array of strings.
remove copy variable for no reason
pass on the configured format to the DateValidator instead of hardcoding it
no chaining in form class' bind method
change boolean to bool for consistency
ClassMethods hydrator and wrong method definition
Adding attributes for a lightweight export
[Router] no need to correct ~ in the path encoding
Fix for broken handling of Zend\ServiceManager\ServiceManager::shareByDefault = false (Issue #3408)
Remove import of Zend root namespace
SessionManager: Throw exception when attempting to setId after the session has been started
Individual shared setting does not override the shareByDefault setting of the ServiceManager
Adding logic to check module dependencies at module loading time
The display_exceptions config-option is not passed to 404 views.
[#3055] Remove array to string conversion notice
[#3446] Allow generic traversable configuration to Captcha element
Fixed bug in acl introduced by acca10b6abe74b3ab51890d5cbe0ab8da4fdf7e0
Replace all is\_null($value) calls with null === $value
Explode validator: allow any value type to be validated
The hasACL and hasRole don't check their default member variables
Fix for the issue #3541 - salt size for Encrypt/Decrypt Filter
Fix: Calling count() results in infinite loop
Zend\Db: Fix for #3523 changeset - composer.json and stdlib
Fix name of plugin referred to in exception message
\Zend\Json\Server Fix \_getDefaultParams if request-params are an associative array
Update Travis to start running tests on PHP 5.5
fixed Zend\Log\Logger::registerErrorHandler() doesn't log previous exceptions
